replies.body:
This is a great initiative, it's important that all summoners are aware of their own physical HP and mental MP, because being in poor shape is going to also reflect poorly in the games you play through your micro/macro plays. If you're feeling 100%, then your games should also be 100%. If you're feeling 0%, then your games are gonna be 0%, and it's going to affect not just your teammates, but it's going to affect you yourself. You, are the most important person, in the end, whether you win or lose, you need to have a GG. 

Be positive! {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
{{sticker:sg-kiko}} Love this comment so much, Redrawnant!
riot has deteriorated my mental state help
dont worry bro all you have to do is level it up!!!!
The best thing I've seen riot release since the star guardian skins{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
If Riot cares about my mental health, they could actually act on more of my reports of toxic players in solo queue.
I've been abused more in this game mode than I have in the normal modes, 11/10 more likely to commit suicide now ty rito!
How about work on fixing ur broken game
